en: {player} <J>sold a house on {!property} which has <BL>{count} <J>houses now.
tr: {player}, {!property} <J>üstünde bulunan bir evi sattı, artık mülkün üstünde <BL>{count} <J>ev var.

en: {player} <J>bought a house for {!property} which has <BL>{count} <J>houses now.
tr: {player}, {!property} <J>için bir ev satın aldı, artık mülkün üstünde <BL>{count} <J>ev bulunuyor.
pl: as above. Did he buy or did she buy? on kupił vs ona kupiła
br: {player} <J>comprou uma casa para {!property} que tem <BL>{count} <J>casas agora.

en: {player1} <J>gave a "Get Out of Jail Free" card to {player2} in a trade.
ar: في مبادلة  {player2}  <J>اعطى بطاقة "الخروج من السجن مجانا" الى {player1}
br: {player1} <J>deu um cartão "Saia da cadeia" para {player2} em uma trade.

en: {player} <R>rolled a double 3 times and went to jail.
tr: {player} <R>üç defa çift zar attığı için hapise düştü.
ar: <R>لعب نرد مزدوج ثلاث مرات وذهب الى السجن {player}
br: {player} <R>girou um double 3 vezes e foi para a cadeia.

en: {player} <J>rolled a <CH>{dice1} <J>and <CH>{dice2} <J>and failed to escape from jail!
br: {player} <J>girou um <CH>{dice1} <J>e <CH>{dice2} <J>e falho de escapar da cadeia!

en: {player} <J>paid the <VP>$50 <J>fine to get out of jail.
{player} <J>rolled doubles to get out of jail.
{player} <J>used a "Get Out of Jail Free" card.
<ROSE>Roll the dice to determine start order.
br: <ROSE>Jogue os dados para determinar a ordem inicial.

en: {player} <J>has to pay <VP>$200 <J>in income tax from collecting too much cheese!
tr: {player} <J>çok fazla peynir topladığı için <VP>$200 <J>gelir vergisi ödemek zorunda kaldı.
br: {player} <J>tem que pagar <VP>$200 <J>em imposto de renda por coletar muito queijo!

en: {player} <J>has to pay <VP>$100 <J>in luxury tax for being too noob!
tr: {player} <J>fazla noob olduğu için <VP>$100 <J>özel tüketim vergisi ödemek zorunda kaldı.
br: {player} <J>precisa paga <VP>$100 <J>em imposto de luxo por ser muito noob!

en: {player} <R>went bankrupt and has lost the game! All of their assets will be turned over to {playerowner}.
tr: {player} <R>iflas etti ve oyunu kaybetti! Tüm malvarlığı {playerowner} <R> oyuncusuna devredilecek.
ar: <V>{playerowner} <R>أفلس وخسر اللعبة! سيتم تسليم جميع ممتلكاته إلى {player}
br: {player} <R>faliu e perdeu o jogo! Todos os seus ativos serão entregues a o {playerowner}.

en: {player} <R>went bankrupt and has lost the game! All of their assets will be auctioned.
tr: {player} <R>iflas etti ve oyunu kaybetti! Tüm malvarlığı ihaleyle satışa çıktı.
br: {player} <R>faliu e perdeu o jogo! Todos seus ativos serão leiloados.

en: {player} <J>landed on {!property} <J>owned by {playerowner}. Property is mortgaged, no rent was collected.
tr: {player}<J>, sahibi {playerowner} <J>olan {!property} mülkünün üzerinde. Mülk ipotek edildiği için, kira ödenmedi.
ar: <J>.الأملاك مرهونة. لم يتم تحصيل اي اجار {playerowner} <J>مملوكه من قبل {!property} <J>هبط على {player}
br: {player} <J>aterrissou em {!property} <J>de {playerowner}. O ímovel está hipotecado, nenhum aluguel foi cobrado.

en: <J>Before you can buy a house, you must own all the properties of a color-group.
tr: <J>Ev satın almadan önce bir renk grubundaki tüm mülkiyetlere sahip olmalısınız.
ar: <J> .قبل أن تتمكن من شراء منزل ، يجب أن تمتلك جميع مجموعة اللون
br: <J>Antes de comprar uma casa, você deve possuir todas as propriedades de um grupo de cores.

en: <J>You don't have any house to sell.
br: <J>Você não tem nenhuma casa para vender.

en: <J>You don't have any property you can mortgage.
br: <J>Você não tem nenhuma propriedae que possa hipotecar.

en: <J>You don't have any property you can unmortgage.
ar: <J>ليس لديك أي ممتلكات لفك الرهن العقاري عنها
br: <J>Você não tem nenhuma propriedade que possa desembolsar

en: <J>At least one property in your offer has a house/hotel. You need to either remove the property or offer all properties in its color-group.
tr: <J>Teklifinde en az bir mülkte ev/otel bulunmakta. Mülkü kaldır veya renk grubundaki tüm mülkleri teklife dahil et.
br: <J>Pelo menos uma propriedade em sua oferta tem uma casa/hotel. Você precisa remover a propriedade ou oferecer todas as propriedades em seu grupo de cores.

<G>When it is your turn, press this icon to throw the dice!
Manage your properties by building/selling houses and mortgaging them.
You can trade property with other players for money or other properties.
When you are done with your turn, press this stop sign to end it.

<R> • At the start of the game, all players will roll the dice. The player with the highest number will go first and then the second highest number and so on.
• If you roll doubles, you can play your turn normally and then you get to roll again. If you roll three doubles in a row, you will go to jail.
• When a player passes GO, they will receive $200 from the bank.
• When you land on an unowned property, you can buy it. If you choose not to, the property will be auctioned and all players can bid on it.
• Money can only be loaned by the bank through mortgaged property, and players cannot give or steal money from others.
• When a player lands on another player's property, they need to pay the listed rent.
• Buying houses: When you own all properties on a color-group you can buy houses on those properties. Houses need to be built evenly, for example all properties need to have 1 house before any can have 2. Selling houses back to the bank must be done evely as well. When you have 4 houses on a property, you can buy a hotel for the property. You can only have 1 hotel.
• Selling houses: You can sell properties without houses to other players. Houses and hotels can be sold back to the bank evenly, for example one house from each property before a second house can be sold
• Mortgage: You can mortgage any property if it does not have houses on it,This will allow you to recieve 100% of the property value from the bank, but you cannot earn money from rent while a property is mortgaged. You can fully buy your mortgaged property back from the bank anytime by paying mortgage property cost.
• Bankruptcy: If you owe more money than you can afford to a player or the bank, you are declared bankrupt. If you owe the money to a player, you turn over everything you have of value and leave the game. Any owned houses and hotels will be force to sell them to the bank, and their price will be given in cash to the player who is owed money. Mortgaged property is turned over to the player who is owed money as well. If money is owed to the bank, everything you have of value is taken by the bank, and all properties are auctioned off to the remaining players.
• Jail: You sent to jail if you land on the 'go to jail' space, get a card that tells you to go to jail, or roll doubles three times in a row. You can get out by rolling doubles in your next three turns, using the 'get out of jail free' card, or paying a fine of $50. You can still buy or sell properties, houses, and hotels and you can still collect rent while in jail.
